PREFACE.

THE text of Livy which is here adopted is a reprint of Madvig's, whose Emendationes Livianae discuss most of the important variations from the common text. To that work therefore reference is made when Madvig's authority or arguments are mentioned in the notes.

In matters of Latinity the commentary of Fabri, as enlarged by Heerwagen, has been found most useful, especially the illustrations drawn stom Latin authors.
